title: THE GAME HAS CRASHED PLEASE TRY TO RECONNECT
body:
I just downloaded league and it just so happened to be during the 6.17 patch and I can log on just fine but just as I leave champion select it says The game has crashed please try to reconnect and it won't let me join the game.
I am on mac if that makes a difference.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some trouble staying connected, and is leaving you behind.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this and get you back in-game.  Make sure to select the Mac box for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions!
My internet works fine. Is there away that I can fix it?
Your internet can be godlike, but it doesn't make you immune from reaching specific services like the game server.  You'll want to go over each step of that guide to fix this up.  Good luck!
